posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Gandil - Polar Bear / American Beauty
posts.post_content:
Working on a T206 Gandil back run and hoping to find a Polar Bear or an American Beauty...

Can purchase for cash or trade for T206 HOFers. Feel free to email me at [url]helfrich91@yahoo.com[/url]

Not especially tough. Typical Polar Bear.
I think I have one actually. Let me check. I believe it is FR/PR condition. If youre interested I can send you a picture.
